Its Registered Office is situated at B/311, Virwani Industrial Estate,, W. E. Highway, Goregaon East,, MUMBAI, Mumbai City, Maharashtra, India, 400063.

The Directors of the Company possess huge expertise in manufacturing and trading of clothes.
name: BEAUTY LIFESTYLES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at Earthy Fab are passionate about finding ways to reduce the plastic footprint on our planet. In today’s era, most of the daily use products are made of plastic and synthetics which eventually chokes our planet with non-biodegradable waste after its useful life. All of our products are eco-friendly, sustainable, and ethically manufactured, which are neither harmful to our planet nor to our health in any way.
name: Earthy Fab

idea:
Tisser is known for its fairly traded, eco-friendly and genuine handcrafted products. Tisser Rural Handicrafts Pvt. Ltd. (“Tisser” or “the Company”) is an impact venture established in 2015, to uplift the lives of rural Indian artisans

Bringing in paradigm shift in handloom and handicrafts sector, the Company currently has presence in 18 states and connected with 10,000+ artisans

Tisser provides end-to-end support to artisans starting from artisan mobilization, design and product intervention, alongwith online and offline marketing on B2B and B2C business models

Tisser has so far created a huge social impact through skilled, sustainable rural employment, and preserving India’s traditional handicrafts

The Company co-creates products with rural artisans through skill building and design interventions and sells it in wholesale and retail markets

Tisser has so far curated 1,000+ designer products by providing efficient end-to-end support to the artisans

“Har Ghar Mein Bharat” concept where the Company decorates home spaces with all the Indian art form products, indirectly supporting artisans across India

Women to Women – lets grow together initiative is for connecting 100 women entrepreneur to 100 producer organization
name: Tisser Rural Handicrafts

idea: KWIKTRIP FUELS LLP is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel for your generator (DG sets) / cars/fleet vehicles etc. in a safe, reliable, and efficient way. You can place your order online and get fuel delivered at your location in specialized Refuellers according to your chosen schedule. We are making refueling smarter! When everything in the world is available online, we are coming with providing online home delivery of fuel.
name: KWIKTRIP FUELS LLP

idea:
The SuperFood Factory was born from the thought of wanting to instil instant meals with health and taste. We, at The SuperFood Factory want to make sure that you take in only the best curated ingredients. 


An instant meal on the go, is not such a bad thing after all. Dig deeper, closer to the roots and find many more natural sources of protein, fibre, carbs and nutrients.

Visit us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/superfoodfactory/
name: The SuperFood Factory

idea:
EPC SOLAR SPACE PVT. LTD was started with a vision to deliver

sustainable energy solutions for all, mainly Solar Energy. We

believe in conserving energy and generating energy via alternative sources.

We understand your individual needs. We help you navigate ever

rising energy prices & the threat of climate change. We discover

the opportunities that will make your organisation more

sustainable, more competitive, more profitable, & hence, more

valuable to society.

ABOUT US

It has an experienced in-house design, engineering & construction team that, with its technical expertise and in-depth industry

know-how, can develop the most cost-effective and energy

efficient PV solar plants of any scale.
name: EPC SOLAR SPACE PRIVATE LIMITED
